tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE message_log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES sensitive_messages(message_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(50),
    receiver VARCHAR(50),
    message_text TEXT,
    encrypted_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    password_hash VARCHAR(100),
    public_key TEXT,
    private_key TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    session_token VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    contact_username VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE keys (
    key_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    key_name VARCHAR(50),
    key_value TEXT
)
